channel.title: Infiltrator (Neutral Social)
channel.description:
Infiltrator Unique Occupy Immune Neutral Social
Passive 1 - Read Lips: Able to spy and read all whispers Passive 2 - On a mission: Cannot be occupied at night. ___ Night Ability 1 - Expert Deduction: Discover a player's class. (Infinite) Night Ability 2 - Spiteful Execution: Attack a player (1 use). ___ Day Ability - Hidden Message: Your next whisper is hidden ___ Win Condition: Survive to see the defeat of the blue dragon

item.title: Infiltrator (Neutral Social)
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
RHCube:

Should be “survive to see the blue dragon defeated”. I’m not against having this win con for SS, but an anti-whisper NE should have it

Without at least night immunity, I would advise against this change.

Read full topic

item.title: Infiltrator (Neutral Social)
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
3 things need to be fix here:

1 - Social mean using the chatbox to gather info/deduct evil. And your class near the point of Special Class

2 - Occ immune Social? claps you juat created an unstoppable neut

3 - Hidden whisper? I prefer check a player to see if they talk to someone at night ( get result in the end of night)

Read full topic

item.title: Infiltrator (Neutral Social)
item.dc:creator: Charrlous
item.description:
took some suggestions into account now.

Read full topic

item.title: Infiltrator (Neutral Social)
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Charrlous:

Passive 2 - On a mission: Cannot be occupied at night

This should just be a normal occupation immunity.

Charrlous:

Night Ability 2 - Spiteful Execution: Kill a player, bypassing night immunity, you must discover the target player as a blue dragon before using this (1 use)

Bypassing night immunity is too much. The only reason why a BD would have night immunity is if the king guards them.

Charrlous:

Defeat the blue dragon

Should be “survive to see the blue dragon defeated”. I’m not against having this win con for SS, but an anti-whisper NE should have it

Read full topic

item.title: Infiltrator (Neutral Social)
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Charrlous:

Night Ability 2 - Spiteful Execution: Kill a player, bypassing night immunity, you must discover the target player as a blue dragon before using this (1 use)

Change this to just a single use ‘kill a player’ with nothing else attached. It makes more sense given the passives to read whispers in their entirety.

Something else that could be done with this class is to give it a way to ‘noble twin’. Most of the time this class claims Noble, given the whisper reading.

A way to make Nobles unconfirmable actually sounds like a great idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Infiltrator (Neutral Social)
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
Hmm idk. I like it but it seems a bit too powerful. He can find and kill prince in 2 nights.

Read full topic

item.description:
Infiltrator
Unique Occupy Immune Neutral Social

Passive 1 - Read Lips: Able to spy and read all whispers
Passive 2 - On a mission: Cannot be occupied at night.

Night Ability 1 - Expert Deduction: Discover a player’s class. (Infinite)
Night Ability 2 - Spiteful Execution: Attack a player (1 use).

Day Ability - Hidden Message: Your next whisper is hidden

Win Condition:
Survive to see the defeat of the blue dragon
